scenario_text.value:
Hey Takuma, isn’t that Aoi and Labramon over
there?!
Yeah! But something’s not right...

Wait... Please wait, Saki. Don’t leave me all
alone...!

Snap out of it, Aoi! There’s... There’s no
way that’s Saki!

Don’t tell me... Is Aoi trapped in her own
illusion?
Oh no, we have to save her, Takuma!
Aoi! Labramon! Are you guys okay?!

Takuma! Agumon! You gotta do something, Aoi
is...!

Please, Saki...forgive me, already. I’ll come
be with you, I promise...
Saki? What does she mean?
Takuma, over there!

Hehe... Hurry up, Aoi. Otherwise I won’t
forgive you.
(Is that...Saki!? There’s no way!)

(That has to be an illusion! We have to snap
Aoi out of it, and fast!)

(She should know that Saki would never do
something like this.)

(But would Aoi even understand right now if
I said something? Should I hold her back?)
(How do I bring Aoi back?)
Say it’s an illusion.
Restrain her.

Aoi, this isn’t the real Saki! It’s just an
illusion!
Huh...? Takuma? Why are you...?
How could you say that Saki is an illusion?

She’s... She’s right here! Saki’s right here
in front of us!

Think about it! Would Saki ever want to put
her friends in danger?!

The real Saki wouldn’t want you to go where
she is... Not a chance!
You can’t go, Aoi!

No... NOOOOOO! Let me go! I wanna be with
Saki!
Calm down, Aoi!

Look closely! Whoever that is smiling like
that... How could that be Saki?!
B-but... If that’s not Saki...then...
No! You’re wrong! That has to be her!
I’m right, aren’t I, Saki?!
Stop, Aoi!

Hurry... Hurry! Come to me. I’ll finish you
off quickly!
Grrrwlll...!
Aaaaaah!!!
The enemy was hiding?!

Leave this to me, Takuma! You take care of
Aoi!
Okay! I’m counting on you, Agumon!
